name: Box Tower
description:
BOX TOWER is an addictive game. Drop the box that is moving on the other box.Touch,Mouse And Keyboard all are supported.While playing on pc or laptop use “Space” key to drop the box or press left click to drop the box.While playing on smartphone or tablet,tap anywhere on the screen to drop the box.This game is compatible with Admob. This game is created using Construct 2.

Features : 

  • Made with Construct 2
  • Admob Ads (Banner & Interstitial)
  • Full HD 1080×1920 pixels
  • Touch,mouse and keyboard supported
  • Ready export to Android & IOS
  • Sound effect
  • Highscore
